src:
Polisi Periksa 3 Tersangka Tewasnya Mahasiswa saat Diksar Menwa di Sumsel
01 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Raja Adil Siregar
Palembang - Polres Ogan Ilir di Sumatera Selatan menetapkan tiga panitia Diksar Resimen Mahasiswa sebagai tersangka. Ketiganya diperiksa perdana siang ini di Mapolres.
"Tiga panitia jadi tersangka, kita periksa hari ini. Pertama diperiksa setelah kami tetapkan tersangka," ujar Kasat Reskrim Polres Ogan Ilir, AKP malik saat dimintai konfirmasi, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Dikatakan Malik, ketiga tersangka akan diperiksa di Mapolres. Mereka diperiksa untuk dimintai keterangan terkait saksi-saksi yang menyebut ada penganiayaan saat Diksar Menwa di Ogan Ilir 2 pekan lalu.
"Saksi menyebut ada penganiayaan, tapi tersangka belum ada keterangan karena baru siang ini kita panggil. Ada tiga kami tetapkan tersangka, semua panitia," kata Malik.
Perlu diketahui mahasiswa Universitas Taman Siswa Palembang, Muhammad Akbar tewas saat Diksar Menwa, Rabu (16/10) lalu sekitar pukul 15.25 WIB. Ia tewas di rumah sakit Ar Royan Ogan Ilir setelah mengalami kaki kram.
text:
Police Investigate 3 Suspected Students' Deaths when Meniksar Menwa in South Sumatra
Nov 1 2019, 10:30 by Raja Adil Siregar
Palembang - Ogan Ilir Regional Police in South Sumatra named three Student Regiment Diksar committees as suspects. The three were first examined this afternoon at Mapolres.
"Three committees were named suspects, we will examine them today. The first will be examined after we have determined the suspects," said Kasat Reskrim Ogan Ilir Regional Police, AKP Malik when asked for confirmation on Friday (1/11/2019).
Malik said, the three suspects will be examined at the Mapolres. They were questioned for questioning related to witnesses who said there had been mistreatment during the Menwa Diksar in Ogan Ilir 2 weeks ago.
"The witness mentioned that there was persecution, but the suspect has not yet given any information because we have just called this afternoon. We have named three suspects, all committees," Malik said.
It should be noted that the student of Taman Siswa Palembang University, Muhammad Akbar was killed during the Meniks Diksar, Wednesday (10/16) then at around 15:25 WIB. He died at the Ar Royan Ogan Ilir hospital after experiencing leg cramps.
